command: kubectl run persona-codehub-register -n personas --rm -i --restart=Never --image=curlimages/curl:8.8.0 --command -- sh -lc 'curl -sS -X POST https://api.example-code.test/api/v1/users -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Accept: application/json" -d "{\"username\":\"artisanal-outreach\",\"email\":\"artisanal.outreach@example-mail.test\",\"password\":\"S3cure!Passw0rd\",\"full_name\":\"Avery Outreach\"}"'
explanation: Creates a developer platform account to establish a technical footprint for the persona.
rationale_steps: Register a code hosting account with consistent persona attributes.
Supports cross-platform persona continuity and reputation.
